Dopezilla Glass Replacement Bowl with Handle – Male Joint

EG13DB14

Log in for pricing

Every now and again, it’s time to replace your bowl. This functional and effective 14mm replacement bowl is perfect your Dopezilla bong! It will match the aesthetic perfectly, is constructed from durable glass, and features a male joint with a clear glass handle. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

  • Made from durable glass
  • Glass-on-glass joint
  • Clear glass handle
  • Anti-roll stabilization
  • 14mm male joint
  • Easy to clean and maintain

If you’re looking to replace your Dopezilla bowl, or simply looking for a quality, affordable bowl for any glass piece with a 14mm female joint, this replacement bowl is just the ticket! It’s designed for everyday use and will last for years with proper care.

Dopezilla 30mm Lego Cube Silicone Stash Jar – 25/Jar

F528X

Log in for pricing

Keep your concentrates fresh and dab like a BEAST with silicone storage solutions from Dopezilla!

  • High-grade Silicone
  • Airtight Seal
  • Non-Stick Surface
  • Familiar Lego Block Style
  • Eye-Catching Design w/ Beast Logo
  • Conveniently Packaged in a 25-count Jar
  • Measures 30mm x 30mm

The Dopezilla Silicone Lego Cube Stash Jar does everything you would expect a top-quality storage container to do. The difference is these mythical stash jars look badass while doing it. Eith an impressive airtight seal, they make the perfect companion for smokers who want to safely secure some concentrate, or even a little bit of bud.

These funky, multi-coloured silicone cubes have a textured top that looks like a lego brick. They’re easy to spot, and easy to recognize while rummaging around blind in a bag or pocket. Each one features a printed Dopezilla logo of a best-selling beasts from across the Dopezilla universe! Cerberus, Basilisk, Hydra, they’re all there. Plus, the illusive Minotaur makes an appearance!

These amazing little stach jars come conveniently packaged in a 25-count jar. Perfect for POP sale, you can simply open the lid, and literally release the kraken.

Dopezilla Stinger Nectar Collector 90 Degree-Male

F5239

Log in for pricing

The Stinger by Dopezilla is revolutionizing the way you hit dabs. Ditch your typical tools, there’s no more need for fragile carb caps or dabbers. Just heat the tip of The Stinger until a red ring appears, then dip it in your concentrate for the ultimate dabbing experience. Need to conserve? Take a small amount beforehand and use that for your supply. Without all the extra accessories to clean The Stinger provides you with less mess and since it disassembles, an easier cleaning process. Any bong can be converted into a rig with The Stinger, just find the correct fitting and angle. Typical nectar collectors can be harsh, while this allows you to use the glass you’ve already got and take advantage of the water filtration. Rip it just like you would hit a bowl. Remove the additional piece to clear the chamber in one hit. Conserve your concentrates. Get the perfect dab. Every time! The Stinger is made from handblown borosilicate glass, comes in male and female fittings and both 45 and 90 degrees.

F5239 - Dopezilla Stinger-Dabbing Straw-90 Degree-Male

Banshee

  • High quality borosilicate glass
  • Beaker base
  • 14.5mm Female Joint
  • Male 14.5mm quartz banger
  • Drum percolator
  • No carb hole
  • Colourful accents on the mouthpiece, bowl and monster logo

 

Dopezilla has launched a new collection that includes five horrifying dab rigs, all adorned with their own nefarious monster. The Banshee by Dopezilla is made from handblown borosilicate glass that can stand the test of time, delivered in its own matching custom box.

Listen closely and you can hear the Banshee’s wails, a clear straight tube dab rig with coloured accents on the mouthpiece, base and monster logo. The bent neck mouthpiece provides protection from splashback during your hit. Banshee features a drum percolator that makes your hit so smooth, you’ll be shrieking for more.

The 10” Banshee straight tube comes delivered with a male 14.5mm quartz banger. A banger is the preferred method for dabbing, making it easier and more efficient to use than typical accessories of the past.

If you’re looking for a solid and frightening straight tube dab rig to add to your glass collection, you have found your ideal piece. Purchase Banshee and the rest of the Dopezilla collection for the best available prices.

Dopezilla Cerberus Dab Rig - 8”

A5009DB

Log in for pricing

Dopezilla Glass Straight Tube Ice Rig – Cerberus

Act fast, the hound of Hades who guards the underworld is here

  • High quality borosilicate glass
  • Straight tube
  • 14.5mm ground joint
  • 14.5mm quartz banger
  • Bullet-hole ice pinch
  • No carb hole
  • Colourful accents on the mouthpiece, bowl, base and monster logo

Dopezilla has launched a new collection that includes four epic pieces: three bongs and one dab rig, all adorned with their own horrifying monster. The Cerberus by Dopezilla is handcrafted from the finest borosilicate glass that is able to withstand the test of time, all delivered, safely stored, in their own matching custom box.

Part of this fun collection is Cerberus, a clear straight tube ice rig with a quartz banger and coloured base, percolator, mouthpiece and custom monster logo is extremely easy to clean and maintain. The honeycomb percolator helps break up the smoke to deliver extra smooth hits. It features ice notches, for optimal filtration with a frosty touch.

The Cerberus straight tube comes delivered with a male quartz banger. The banger allows you to easily heat your extracts without the hassle that comes with a nail and dome. The shape allows for the piece to not roll when placed on a table.
